name: FrickGlow
description: Hides all glow-related objects (including glow from blocks).

optionsAPI.name: Settings as Options
optionsAPI.description:
Adds the checkmark (boolean) settings of this mod into the "More Options" menu.
<cy>Requires ninXout's Options API mod.</c>
<c_>Changing ths setting requires a full game restart.</c>

excludeInvisibleFromHideGlow.name: Exclude Invisible Objects from Hidden Glow
excludeInvisibleFromHideGlow.description: Excludes invisible objects when <cl>Hide Glow from Solids</c> is enabled.

hideGlowGameplayElements.name: Hide Glow from Gameplay Elements
hideGlowGameplayElements.description:
Hide glow from gameplay elements.
More specifically: jump orbs, speed portals, and jump pads.

disableGradientTriggers.name: Hide Glow from Gradient Triggers
disableGradientTriggers.description:
Hide glow from gradient triggers.
<c_>(Not recommended unless if you know what you're doing.)</c>

README: i'm not a huge fan of making Options API a required depdendency, but there's been this stupid bug where marking it as anything lower than a required depdendency stops the toggles from being added to the game. sorry about that--to compensate, you can toggle that option off in the mod settings.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
